content:
TITLE: Option Monad Usage Examples
DESCRIPTION: Examples demonstrating usage of Option monad including Some, None, FlatMap and Match operations
SOURCE: https://github.com/samber/mo/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: go
CODE:
```
option1 := mo.Some(42)
// Some(42)

option1.
    FlatMap(func (value int) Option[int] {
        return Some(value*2)
    }).
    FlatMap(func (value int) Option[int] {
        return Some(value%2)
    }).
    FlatMap(func (value int) Option[int] {
        return Some(value+21)
    }).
    OrElse(1234)
// 21

option2 := mo.None[int]()
// None

option2.OrElse(1234)
// 1234

option3 := option1.Match(
    func(i int) (int, bool) {
        // when value is present
        return i * 2, true
    },
    func() (int, bool) {
        // when value is absent
        return 0, false
    },
)
// Some(42)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing mo package using go get
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the mo package using Go modules
SOURCE: https://github.com/samber/mo/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go get github.com/samber/mo@v1
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Basic mo Package Import
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to import the mo package
SOURCE: https://github.com/samber/mo/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: go
CODE:
```
import (
    "github.com/samber/mo"
)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Local Development Setup Commands
DESCRIPTION: Commands for setting up the development environment and running tests locally without Docker
SOURCE: https://github.com/samber/mo/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Install some dev dependencies
make tools

# Run tests
make test
# or
make watch-test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Docker Development Setup Command
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the development environment using Docker
SOURCE: https://github.com/samber/mo/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker-compose run --rm dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Alternative Import Style
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to import the entire library into namespace (not recommended)
SOURCE: https://github.com/samber/mo/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: go
CODE:
```
import (
    . "github.com/samber/mo"
)
```
